channel.title: Moparscape
channel.description: Would it be possible to create a simple server out of the standard moparscape client and server (Hybridscape thingy with client.java added by me)?

item.title: Moparscape
item.dc:creator: @Saphire1 Saphire`
item.description:
@Saphire1 wrote:

Bill_:

Wrong, when you download the actual client, not the webclient, you can easily find the hybridscape files and decompile them, or you could PM me and I’d send you the original hybridscape 6 which I own

It’s not hard too google.

Read full topic

item.title: Moparscape
item.dc:creator: @Bill1 Bill_
item.description:
@Bill1 wrote:

Wrong, when you download the actual client, not the webclient, you can easily find the hybridscape files and decompile them, or you could PM me and I’d send you the original hybridscape 6 which I own

item.title: Moparscape
item.dc:creator: @n00bf0rlyf3 n00bf0rlyf3
item.description:
@n00bf0rlyf3 wrote:

[quote=“Newty, post:4, topic:391796”][quote author=jaspertjeoo link=topic=488962.msg3574605#msg3574605 date=1303327430]

If you are using the Moparscape web client and you start a server then I don’t believe that its possible to do any editing of the server. As for using the moparscape client for your own server that is 100 percent possible; in fact I recommend using Mopars client because it is guaranteed to be cleaner then most other existing clients.

hi
[/quote]

Hola, como esta?[/quote]
Me llamo bossio, y tu?

Read full topic

item.title: Moparscape
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

someone2:

Would it be possible to create a simple server out of the standard moparscape client and server (Hybridscape thingy with client.java added by me)?

Yes but the MSCP webclient is jarred with HybridScape. I believe that as long as you already have a server running when you open the webclient, it should work.

Read full topic

item.title: Moparscape
item.dc:creator: @someone2 someone2
item.description:
@someone2 wrote:

mashamaru:

[quote]are u able to put the moparscape servers online so everyone can play your server?

yes, but you cant change anything in the server it’s self[/quote]
You can. And thanks Newty, I guess I’ll make one out of it. I’ve already put in client.java from winterlove (I chose the one from winterlove because that’s the most “clean” one IMO).

Read full topic
